entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
